src_original: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /  yato na buddhadharmāḥ,
yato na bodhiḥ,  yato na mārgaḥ,  yato na niḥsaraṇam,
sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ /
nāsti kleśānāṃ saṃnicayo rāśībhāvaḥ,  na rāgabhāvaḥ,
